ygData.subject: RE: Centaur info on Crafted Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: 1. See below, otherwise hail the named cents and follow the prompts. 2. No, anyone can do the quest. 3. The Star Rubies, Fire Emeralds, Rubies, and Sapphires
ygData.messageBody:
1. See below, otherwise hail the named cents and follow the prompts.
2. No, anyone can do the quest.
3. The Star Rubies, Fire Emeralds, Rubies, and Sapphires can be bought in a
number of places that sell the jewelling metals (Qeynos and Freeport
verified). The other components are dropped items.
4. WAR only items, all races though. Check sites like EQ'Lizer for the
actual stats on them.

Gauntlets: Aviak Charm (Aviak Avocets, South Karana), and 2 Star Rubies
Boots: Frost Totem (Ice Goblin High Shamans, Permafrost), 2 Star Rubies
Helm: Fire Totem (Fire Goblin High Clerics, Solusek), 2 Rubies
Vambrace: Eye of a Griffon (East Commonlands, North Karana, etc.), 2 Fire
Emeralds
Bracer: Evil Eye Optic Nerve (rare drop item like the Polished Bone Bracer),
a Sapphire
Greaves: Silver Circlet (Necromancer in Najena), 2 Star Rubies <-don't have
the name yet
Pauldrones: the Three Parts of the Rune of Dwarves (Evil Eyes, Runnyeye),
Fire Emerald
Breastplate: Werewolf Talons (Mistmoore, Mayong Tribe), 3 Rubies


Trajen D'Fraust
Barbarian Shaman, 29th Order
Innoruk Server

-----Original Message-----
From: Thulgar [mailto:thulgar@...]
Sent: Monday, August 02, 1999 3:49 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: [EQCheats] Centaur info on Crafted Armor


Ok, I had a question about the crafted Armor, I know now that you can get it
from the Centaur
Village in South Karana, now the thing I ASK is:

1. What do I have to do to GET the crafted items started, *btw the armors
light blue*
2. Is this a warriors only quest, or can anyone do it
3. Where do I get the items to complete this Quest, details on where and
what holds them, *mobs,
vendors, places etc.
4. What are the stats on the Crafted items, i.e Can us lovely SHAMANS wear
it


All details can be sent to me, money is almost no option, but I don't want
BS prices if you don't
know don't respond. I'm the Grand Master of my guild and I would like to
start gathering verified
information, that i can pass onto my guildmates as *Fact*.

Thank you for your time

Thulgar
Grand Master of the Mystical Knights
htttp://www.efni.com/~thulgar
